verses.name: Ezra 2:15
verses.text: The children of Adin, four hundred fifty and four.

verses.name: Ezra 2:16
verses.text: The children of Ater of Hezekiah, ninety and eight.

verses.name: Ezra 2:17
verses.text: The children of Bezai, three hundred twenty and three.

verses.name: Ezra 2:18
verses.text: The children of Jorah, an hundred and twelve.

verses.name: Ezra 2:19
verses.text: The children of Hashum, two hundred twenty and three.

verses.name: Ezra 2:20
verses.text: The children of Gibbar, ninety and five.

verses.name: Ezra 2:21
verses.text: The children of Beth–lehem, an hundred twenty and three.

verses.name: Ezra 2:22
verses.text: The men of Netophah, fifty and six.

verses.name: Ezra 2:23
verses.text: The men of Anathoth, an hundred twenty and eight.

verses.name: Ezra 2:24
verses.text: The children of Azmaveth, forty and two.

verses.name: Ezra 2:25
verses.text: The children of Kirjath–arim, Chephirah, and Beeroth, seven hundred and forty and three.
